publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8086 Sarah Boyack: Edinburgh Fair Trade Awardsâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the winners of the 2011 Edinburgh Lord Provost Fair Trade Awards, presented to local cafes and eateries for commitment to ethical and fair trade products; recognises Yum Cafe, Fair Trade Cafe of Edinburgh University Chaplaincy, Wardie Parish Church, and Equal Exchange for what it considers to be their well-deserved awards, and commends all such initiatives that encourage fair and responsible trade in Scotland and abroad. Supported by: Patricia Ferguson*, Bill Butler*, Mike Pringle*, James Kelly*, Robin Harper*, Trish Godman*, Marlyn Glen*, John Scott*, David Whitton*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Malcolm Chisholm*
S3M-8086 Edinburgh Fair Trade Awards (lodged on 7 March 2011) Elaine Smith*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Jackie Baillie*, George Foulkes*, Mary Mulligan*
